title: You won’t vote your way out
author: VD
content_html:
Not when the enemy controls the voting machines, the courts, and the media. If the Narrative is to be believed, those incorrigibly racist Southern whites who hate Blacks and Jews genuinely want to be represented in the Senate by a Black and a Jew. Seems likely…

50.2{e61d147451bc60549e96d95b5c07be35845e0345eab7ed5d54cc3d49f812ab5c}  2,208,717  Ossof (D)

49.8{e61d147451bc60549e96d95b5c07be35845e0345eab7ed5d54cc3d49f812ab5c}  2,192,347  Perdue (R)

50.6{e61d147451bc60549e96d95b5c07be35845e0345eab7ed5d54cc3d49f812ab5c}  2,227,296  Warnock (D)

49.4{e61d147451bc60549e96d95b5c07be35845e0345eab7ed5d54cc3d49f812ab5c}  2,173,866  Loeffler (R)

It’s also being reported that The office of the National Archives did not forward the alternate slates of electors to Congress because the Electoral Count Act permits them “to only pass along slates certified by the states.” So it looks like Pence can simply approve the Biden slates while claiming that he has no other choice.

NeonRevolt explains why Americans shouldn’t count on Mike Pence today:

According to White, after papering over various Seth-Rich-related loose ends, Deputy Attorney General Rod Rosenstein would sign off on illegal FISA warrants, in order to entrap the Trump administration in the entire “Russian Collusion” lie.

This we know, but what we haven’t known up until this point was his motivation.

Why would he do this?

Simply put, because he saw Pence as more deserving of “the throne;” someone whom he could work with, with a more even and pragmatic keel, who would probably overlook his treasonous dalliances in selling intelligence to foreign powers, and who wouldn’t let all that messy, antiquated “America First” ideology get in the way of “progress.”

According to recorded testimony from our whistleblower, Rosenstein, together with Pence’s knowledge and consent, went on to help engineer the entire coup attempt against President Trump – in an attempt to oust Trump, and promote Pence to the Presidency, at which point, Pence would turn around and appoint Rod Rosenstein as VP….

Sadly, despite being told by my sources in Washington that Pence himself read this article and initially appeared to agree with it, it seems that Pence has decided to back away right as we come to the precipice; that he will refuse to save this Republic, and has in actuality now planning to betray President Trump at this, the final hour.

I always knew this would be an option for Pence. Should he really desire to betray Trump, all he had to do was keep his cards close to his chest, pretend to be an ally, and then flip at the last possible second in order to run out the clock and prevent Trump from being able to respond at all.

This is what’s happening now. 

Read the whole thing. And when I say the whole thing, I mean the whole thing, all three parts, up to and including the end… I guarantee Neon’s article ends with a real bang. So does this mean it’s all over for President Trump? Of course not! The election fraud will not be completed until the state electors are certified and House votes to confirm them for Joe Biden. If President Trump is going to act – and he has sent every signal that he will – he is probably going to wait until after the headline events of today. As I have been telling you since November 3rd, the crucial date is January 20th, not today.

And remember, /pol/ is always right.

The dude should just declare martial law and clean up. If he just leaves on the 20th he’s the biggest “all talk no action” pussy on the planet.

It would appear that the American people are now more than ready for the God-Emperor to cross the Rubicon.
